resources.string:
At FoalEd we’re passionate about supporting you and building your confidence in all things foalings, so we can help you to give your foals the best possible start to life.

www.foaled.co.nz

Founder and Trainer Ashleigh Davis has over 15 years experience working with horses, the last 10 years primarily across the Thoroughbred sector in New Zealand.

Ashleigh studied at Massey University in New Zealand and holds a Bachelor of Applied Science with a major in Equine Studies, as well as a Graduate Diploma in Business with a major in Human Resource Management.
Christie and Brendan are developers living in Wellington. We are passionate about learning and mobile development. Our git accounts are ....
If you can\'t find the answer to your question here please feel free to get in touch by emailing info@foaled.co.nz or check out our Facebook page.
IT SEEMS QUITE EXPENSIVE – WHY DOES IT COST WHAT IT DOES?

\nInitially it may seem expensive but when you consider that you happily pay up to $150+ an hour for riding lessons it puts it all in perspective. \n On top of this you pay for vets and stallion/semen fees for foals and we look forward to having them so much. $150 for 3+ hours of education is a small price to pay if it is the difference between being able to identify issues and potentially save our mare and or foal.
DO I GET A QUALIFICATION FOR ATTENDING YOUR FOALING SEMINAR?
\nNo. There is no formal qualification for completing the course. However if you are interested please talk to us and we may be able to direct you towards some more formal training.
THERE ISN’T A SEMINAR SCHEDULED FOR MY TOWN – WILL YOU COME HERE?
\nWe are happy to travel to deliver training, however we need to be guaranteed a minimum of 6 participants. Please contact us if you think there is enough interest in your area.
WHO IS THE TRAINING AIMED AT?

FoalEd seminars are aimed at people who may or may not know much about horses. This includes: 
 – Small breeding operations starting out 
 – People breeding for pleasure/personal reasons (e.g. breeding from their favourite mare) 
 – People who are interested in learning more about foaling 
 – People who may want to get into work in the Thoroughbred, Standardbred, Sporthorse or any other industry which involves breeding and foaling down of mare.
 – Anyone who wants to be there
WHAT WILL I LEARN ABOUT IN A SEMINAR?
\nYou can find more information on what is covered in the seminar in the Intro to Foaling Seminar Page.
Thanks for using FoalEd! We love hearing feedback about your experience on the app. Please email support@foaled.co.nz or submit feedback below!
